question: Why did the tectonic plates break up?
It wasn't their fault, but there was just too much friction between them!
What did one tectonic plate say when it bumped into another?
What's the favorite type of music for tectonic plates?
They love rock and roll, but they really move to heavy metal.
Why did the Earth break up with its magnetic field?
I guess it wasn't attracted anymore!
Why does the Earth never lose its way?
Because it always follows its magnetic field!
What did the compass say to the Earth?
I'm feeling a strong attraction to your north!
Why did the earthquake get a time-out?
Because it wouldn't stop shaking things up!
Why don't seismic waves make good secret agents?
Because they always get picked up by seismographs!
Why did the seismic wave fail its music class?
Because it couldn't find the right frequency!
Why did the apple stop rolling down the hill?
Because it realized gravity isn't just a good idea, it's the law!
Why is gravity such a downer?
Because it never lets you rise above!
Why did the book go to therapy?
Because it had issues with gravity - it couldn't let go!
Why did the Earth apply for a job?
Because it wanted to show off its solid core skills!
Why did the Earth get promoted?
Because it had the right layers for management - crust, mantle, outer core, and inner core!
Why does the Earth never lose at poker?
Because it always plays its cards close to its crust!
Why do geodesists make bad secret keepers?
Because they always spill the Earth's curves and surfaces!
Why did the geodesist go on a diet?
Because he wanted to reduce his geoid bulge!
Why don't geodesists play hide and seek?
Because they always find the shortest path!
Why was the seismologist a great dancer?
Because he could really feel the Earth move!
Why don't seismologists make good comedians?
Because their jokes are always a bit too shaky!
Why did the seismologist break up with his girlfriend?
Because he felt too many tremors in the relationship!
Why did the wave rush to shore?
It heard there was a tsunami warning and didn't want to miss the action!
Why did the tsunami break up with the earthquake?
Because it felt their relationship was too turbulent!
Why don't tsunamis make good secret keepers?
Because they always spill the ocean's secrets onto the shore!
Why was the volcano so popular at the party?
Because it always has a blast!
Why did the volcano break up with the mountain?
It said there were just too many eruptions in their relationship.
Why don't volcanoes ever get cold?
Because they always have a hot magma blanket!
Why did the compass break up with the magnet?
Because it said the magnet was too controlling!
Why was the magnet always getting in trouble?
Because it couldn't resist attracting things!
What did the Earth say to the wandering magnet?
You've got a strong pull, but my geomagnetic field is irresistible!
Why did the lightning bolt go to therapy?
Because it had shocking behavior!
Why are clouds such bad liars?
Because you can see right through their lightning!
Why did the cloud get an award?
Because its performance was electrifying!
Why did the rock go to a talent show?
Because it heard it had magnetic personality!
Why did the rock get a lot of dates?
Because it was quite attractive...magnetically!
They always know North. They have a magnetic sense of direction!
Why did the geologist bring a survey form to the field?
Because he wanted to do a rock poll, a geophysical survey!
Why did the geologist say the mountain needs a health check-up?
Because it's time for its geophysical survey!
Why do geologists make good detectives?
Because they always conduct a thorough geophysical survey!
Why did the geologist break up with his girlfriend?
Because she couldn't handle his obsession with geochronology!
Why did the rock go to the time-travel agency?
Because it wanted to explore geochronology!
Why don't geologists ever lose track of time?
Because they always have geochronology to fall back on!
Why did the dinosaur become a geologist?
Because it had a magnetic personality, perfect for studying paleomagnetism!
Why did the ancient rock join the compass club?
It had a thing for paleomagnetism!
Why was the ancient rock always getting lost?
Because it couldn't remember its paleomagnetism!
